did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: New River Community College. Office of the President. Correspondence and subject files, 1969-1981
did.origination: New River Community College. Office of the President.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: New River Community College. Office of the President. Correspondence and subject files, 1969-1981. Accessions 31271, 31390, 32678. State government records collection, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Virginia.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Transferred on 24 June 1981 from the New River Community College, Dublin, Virginia 24084 [Accession 31271].
Transferred on 20 April 1982 from the New River Community College, Dublin, Virginia 24084 [Accession 31390].
Transferred on 28 February 1986 from the New River Community College, Dublin, Virginia 24084 [Accession 32678].

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: These records consist of the correspondence and subject files of the community college president. May include incoming and outgoing correspondence, memoranda and reports that document the functions, activities and policies of the office and the community college.

list.item: Series I: Correspondence and subject files, 1970-1977 [Accession 31271]
Series II: Correspondence and subject files, 1977-1979 [Accession 31390]
Series I: Correspondence and subject files, 1979-1981 [Accession 32678]
